entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a character in the story, watching and reacting to the brain bursting from the tank.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is also mentioned as a character in the story, warning Ron not to touch the tentacles of thought.

entities.name: brain
entities.description: The brain is described as bursting from the tank and flying towards Ron.

entities.name: tank
entities.description: The tank is mentioned as the source of the brain bursting out.

relationships.description: Ron catches the brain in his outstretched hands.
Harry warns Ron not to touch the tentacles of thought.
